title: 'House of the Dragon' S1E2
description:
Chris and Andy break down the second episode of 'House of Dragon,' talking about some of the reservations that they had about this episode (1:00), the intricate politics the show is introducing (21:12), and more moments from the episode (33:53).

Hosts: Chris Ryan and Andy Greenwald
Producer: Kaya McMullen
